name: Sliders (itch) (PancakeSolo)
description:
ONE OF THE HARDEST GAMES YOU WILL EVER PLAY - WORK IN PROGRESS

Short Description: 

Challenge your patience and reflexes while trying to go through different mazes with all kinds of obstacles.

Basic Information: 

  • Gamename: Sliders 
  • Gameversion: 1.2.9
  • Platform: PC / Web Browser 
  • Supported browser: Google Chrome 
  • Engine: Vylocity 
  • Status: On-Hold

Current features:

  • 9 playable levels divided into two sections, section ONE currently has 7 levels and section TWO has 2 levels.
  • Statistics tracking for coins gathered, deaths and amount of levels cleared.
  • Character customization for skin(4), hair(6), dye(3), outfit(6) and color(6). Default values marked between parentheses.
  • Text message system to provide information on how to play the game(tutorial) and notifications during specific events.
  • Shop to expand customization of the character. Current stock contains: hair(4), dye(2), outfit(0), color(1).
  • Text interactions when walking into NPC's and when saving coins.
  • Skills: active(1) and passive(2).
  • Music tracks(9) and settings to mute or change the volume.
  • Saving and loading your progress in the browsers local storage.

Trivia:

  • This is my first ever created video game and i starded this project near the end of April 2020 while having no prior/existing programming knowledge.
  • The game is inspired by several oldschool Warcraft 3 custom maps.
  • Near the end of November 2020 the main source was ceased and the game was recreated from scratch.
  • The game has been on hold since February 2021.
